template.name: RabbitMQ cluster by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Get cluster metrics from RabbitMQ management plugin provided an HTTP-based API using Zabbix agent.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/387226-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-rabbitmq
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages acknowledged
item.description: Number of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages acknowledged per second
item.description: Rate of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged per second

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages confirmed
item.description: Count of messages confirmed

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages confirmed per second
item.description: Rate of messages confirmed per second

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages delivered
item.description: Sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages delivered per second
item.description: Rate per second of the sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages published
item.description: Count of messages published

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages published per second
item.description: Rate of messages published per second

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages publish_in
item.description: Count of messages published from channels into this overview

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages publish_in per second
item.description: Rate of messages published from channels into this overview per sec

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages publish_out
item.description: Count of messages published from this overview into queues

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages publish_out per second
item.description: Rate of messages published from this overview into queues per second,0,rabbitmq,total msgs pub out rate

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages returned redeliver
item.description: Count of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages returned redeliver per second
item.description: Rate of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set per second

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages returned unroutable
item.description: Count of messages returned to publisher as unroutable

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages returned unroutable per second
item.description: Rate of messages returned to publisher as unroutable per second

item.name: RabbitMQ: Channels total
item.description: Total number of channels

item.name: RabbitMQ: Connections total
item.description: Total number of connections

item.name: RabbitMQ: Consumers total
item.description: Total number of consumers

item.name: RabbitMQ: Exchanges total
item.description: Total number of exchanges

item.name: RabbitMQ: Queues total
item.description: Total number of queues

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages total
item.description: Total number of messages (ready plus unacknowledged)

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages ready for delivery
item.description: Number of messages ready for deliver

item.name: RabbitMQ: Messages unacknowledged
item.description: Number of unacknowledged messages

item.name: RabbitMQ: Get exchanges
item.description: The HTTP API endpoint that returns exchanges metrics

item.name: RabbitMQ: Get overview
item.description: The HTTP API endpoint that returns cluster-wide metrics

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Failed to fetch overview data (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages acknowledged per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged per second

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages acknowledged
item_prototype.description: Number of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages confirmed per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages confirmed per second

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages confirmed
item_prototype.description: Count of messages confirmed

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages delivered per second
item_prototype.description: Rate per second of the sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages delivered
item_prototype.description: Sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages published per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages published per second

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages published
item_prototype.description: Count of messages published

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages publish_in per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages published from channels into this overview per sec

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages publish_in
item_prototype.description: Count of messages published from channels into this overview

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages publish_out per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages published from this overview into queues per second,0,rabbitmq,total msgs pub out rate

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages publish_out
item_prototype.description: Count of messages published from this overview into queues

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages redelivered per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set per second

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages redelivered
item_prototype.description: Count of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages returned unroutable per second
item_prototype.description: Rate of messages returned to publisher as unroutable per second

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Exchange {#VHOST}/{#EXCHANGE}/{#TYPE}: Messages returned unroutable
item_prototype.description: Count of messages returned to publisher as unroutable

macro.description: The hostname or IP of RabbitMQ cluster API endpoint
The port of RabbitMQ API endpoint

template.name: RabbitMQ node by Zabbix agent
template.description:
Get node metrics from RabbitMQ management plugin provided an HTTP-based API using Zabbix agent.
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/387226-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-rabbitmq
Template tooling version used: 0.38

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Service response time is too high (over {$RABBITMQ.RESPONSE_TIME.MAX.WARN}s for 5m)

item.name: RabbitMQ: CPU utilization
item.description: Process CPU utilization percentage.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Memory usage (rss)
item.description: Resident set size memory used by process in bytes.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Memory usage (vsize)
item.description: Virtual memory size used by process in bytes.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Free disk space
item.description: Current free disk space

item.name: RabbitMQ: Disk free alarm
item.description: Does the node have disk alarm

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Free disk space alarm (Free space threshold has been reached)

item.name: RabbitMQ: Disk free limit
item.description: Disk free space limit in bytes

item.name: RabbitMQ: Used file descriptors
item.description: Used file descriptors

item.name: RabbitMQ: Memory alarm
item.description: Does the host has memory alarm

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Memory alarm (Memory usage threshold has been reached)

item.name: RabbitMQ: Memory limit
item.description: Memory usage high watermark in bytes

item.name: RabbitMQ: Memory used
item.description: Memory used in bytes

item.name: RabbitMQ: Management plugin version
item.description: Version of the management plugin in use

item.name: RabbitMQ: RabbitMQ version
item.description: Version of RabbitMQ on the node which processed this request

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: RabbitMQ version has changed. Ack to close.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Number of network partitions
item.description: Number of network partitions this node is seeing

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Number of network partitions is too high (more than 0 for 5m)

item.name: RabbitMQ: Is running
item.description: Is the node running or not

item.name: RabbitMQ: Runtime run queue
item.description: Average number of Erlang processes waiting to run

item.name: RabbitMQ: Sockets available
item.description: File descriptors available for use as sockets

item.name: RabbitMQ: Sockets used
item.description: Number of file descriptors used as sockets

item.name: RabbitMQ: Uptime
item.description: Uptime in milliseconds

item.name: RabbitMQ: Healthcheck
item.description: Runs basic healthchecks in the current node. Checks that the rabbit application is running, channels and queues can be listed successfully, and that no alarms are in effect.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Get nodes
item.description: The HTTP API endpoint that returns nodes metrics

trigger.name: RabbitMQ: Failed to fetch nodes data (or no data for 30m)
trigger.description: Zabbix has not received data for items for the last 30 minutes.

item.name: RabbitMQ: Get node overview
item.description: The HTTP API endpoint that returns cluster-wide metrics

item.name: RabbitMQ: Get queues
item.description: The HTTP API endpoint that returns queues metrics

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Consumers
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Memory
item_prototype.description: Bytes of memory consumed by the Erlang process associated with the queue, including stack, heap and internal structures

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages acknowledged per second
item_prototype.description: Number per second of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages acknowledged
item_prototype.description: Number of messages delivered to clients and acknowledged

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages delivered per second
item_prototype.description: Count of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages delivered
item_prototype.description: Count of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages delivered per second
item_prototype.description: Rate per second of the sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages delivered
item_prototype.description: Sum of messages delivered in acknowledgement mode to consumers, in no-acknowledgement mode to consumers, in acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get, and in no-acknowledgement mode in response to basic.get

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages published per second
item_prototype.description: Rate per second of messages published

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages published
item_prototype.description: Count of messages published

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages per second
item_prototype.description: Count per second of the total messages in the queue

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages redelivered per second
item_prototype.description: Rate per second of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages redelivered
item_prototype.description: Count of subset of messages in deliver_get which had the redelivered flag set

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages
item_prototype.description: Count of the total messages in the queue

trigger_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Too many messages in queue (over {$RABBITMQ.MESSAGES.MAX.WARN} for 5m)

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages ready per second
item_prototype.description: Number per second of messages ready to be delivered to clients

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages ready
item_prototype.description: Number of messages ready to be delivered to clients

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages unacknowledged per second
item_prototype.description: Number per second of messages delivered to clients but not yet acknowledged

item_prototype.name: RabbitMQ: Queue {#VHOST}/{#QUEUE}: Messages unacknowledged
item_prototype.description: Number of messages delivered to clients but not yet acknowledged

macro.description: The hostname or IP of RabbitMQ API endpoint
The port of RabbitMQ API endpoint
Maximum number of messages in the queue for trigger expression
Maximum RabbitMQ response time in seconds for trigger expression
